osvSchema.details: An issue was discovered in GTB Central Console 15.17.1-30814.NG. The method systemSettingsDnsDataAction at /opt/webapp/src/AppBundle/Controller/React/SystemSettingsController.php is vulnerable to command injection via the /old/react/v1/api/system/dns/data endpoint. An authenticated attacker can abuse it to inject an arbitrary command and compromise the platform.
